description: Getting frustrated with how short your original Apple cable is? RND Power Solutions white sync & charge Apple Dock to USB Cable allows you to extend your device by 6 feet (double the length of the standard cable) and offers full performance that enables you to sync and charge your devices. You can use this sync cable to connect your device with your Windows PC or Mac, allowing you to easily transfer your favorite pictures or music to and from your computer, and charge the battery at the same time. Don't be fooled by lower quality knock off cables that are unapproved by Apple and will not work with the iPad. Our cable is APPROVED and Licensed by Apple, Case compatible, and meets/exceeds Apple's high manufacturing/quality standards ensuring premium quality that will not damage your device. Our cable has a durable jacket that protects wire cores and resists kinks and tangles. Our cable also has Heavy-duty conductors to handle charging the iPad. RND Power Solutions Long Sync & Charge Apple Dock to USB Cable for Apple devices is compatible with but not limited to: iPad, iPad 2, iPad 3rd generation, iPhone 4S iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 3G, iPhone, iPod touch 4th generation, iPod touch 3rd generation, iPod touch 2nd generation, iPod touch 1st generation, iPod classic 120GB 160GB (2009), iPod classic160GB (2007), iPod classic 80GB, iPod nano 6th generation, iPod nano 5th generation (video camera), iPod nano 4th generation (video), iPod nano 3rd generation (video), iPod nano 2nd generation (aluminum), iPod nano 1st generation, iPod 5th generation (video) and many more. Do not see your device on this list? PLEASE feel free to contact us. We will be happy to assist you.
title: RND Apple Certified Cable for iPad, iPhone, iPod (6 feet/white)
